name: Coherent English Classes
description: Coherent English Classes app is designed for the Bihar school examination Board students who wants to learn, speak and give objectives test in English. Users can easily log in to the app, step by step learning chapter improves students vocabulary, grammar, tenses easy and students can perform the test after completion of each chapter. Main advantages of the application are  - Line by line translation of academic text book. - Best selected objective and its test - Easy and memorable summary and Question answer with Hindi and English translation - Each chapter contains Text, Video and PDF material to learn. - online objective test, game, quiz and film scripts - 10000+ daily uses sentences with hindi pronounciation and its meaning - Oxford 3000  wodrs list with hindi pronounciation and its meaning. - 24 X 7 online supports.  Best app for bihar board 12th and 10th students.  Best App for Hindi English Dictionary  Best App for Hindi- English daily uses sentences.  Online English  Bihar school Examination Board.
